title: [BUG] SKMatrix Operations work well in SkiaSharp 2.88.9 not work in  3.119.0
body:
### Description

In Wasm / Blazor
SKMatrix Operations work well in SkiaSharp 2.88.9 not work in  3.119.0

Compiler error respone


### Code

Compiler Error Code
Code statement Error as follow;
1.   CS1501 : No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments
     SKMatrix.PostConcat( ref Matrix, matrix44.Matrix );

2.   CS0117 : 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
     SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref Matrix, SKMatrix.MakeTranslation(
                    GuaSkiaGfx.DisplaySize.Width / 2.0f, GuaSkiaGfx.DisplaySize.Height / 2.0f ) );

3. CS0117 :  'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeScale'
    SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref Matrix, SKMatrix.MakeScale(GfxScale, GfxScale, Center.X, Center.Y));

4. CS0117 :  'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeRotation'
    SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref Matrix, SKMatrix.MakeRotation((float)zAngle, Center.X, Center.Y));

5. CS0117 : 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity'
    Matrix = SKMatrix.MakeIdentity();

### Expected Behavior

Expect SKMatrix Operations work well in  3.119.0 as in SkiaSharp 2.88.9 


### Actual Behavior

Compiler Error Code CS0117 and CS1501

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.118.0-preview.2 (Next Preview)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.9 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

All

### Platform / Operating System Version

Win 11 / Edge

### Devices

Dell LapTop

### Relevant Screenshots

N/A

### Relevant Log Output

```shell
as above compiler error codes
```
